question: Which movie won the maximum number of awards in 90th Academy Awards ceremony?
explanation: 90th Academy Awards ceremony, popularly referred to as Oscars 2018, honouring the best films of 2017 was held in Los Angeles, California, United States. The ceremony was hosted by comedian Jimmy Kimmel. Fantasy drama film, 'The Shape of Water' got the most awards (in 4 categories) including the Best Picture Award. 'The Shape of Water' was also credited with most nominations (in 13 categories).
